```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
df<-read_csv("countries.txt")
```

```{r}
library(viridis)
df1<-df[,1:10]
names(df1)<-c('country','region','area','popu','popu_density','sexratio','gdp','gdpgrowth','percapita','agriculture')
ggplot()+
  geom_point(data=df1,mapping=aes(x=gdp,y=popu,fill=region))+
  theme_minimal()+
  guides(fill = FALSE)
  
```
